content: As I announced in my shareholder letter a few months ago, these 4 initiatives are: first, the rollout of CineVerse, which will provide consolidated access and cross promotion for all of our streaming properties; second, the aggressive expansion of Cinedigm's podcast network, already with a portfolio of 25 podcasts, 50 million downloads and a goal to get to 100 high-margin podcasts in the next 24 months; third, the rapid launch of our comprehensive in-house advertising solution to capture even more revenue upside in that business; and finally, the imminent rollout of Matchpoint 2.0, which will provide additional revenue opportunities via content aggregation and SaaS services.
